commands.name: az apic create
commands.summary: Creates an instance or update an existing instance of an Azure API Center service.
examples: az apic create -g contoso-resources -n contoso -l eastus
az apic create -g contoso-resources -n contoso -l eastus --identity '{type:systemassigned}'

commands.name: az apic delete
commands.summary: Deletes an instance of an Azure API Center service.

commands.name: az apic import-from-apim
commands.summary: Imports APIs from an Azure API Management service instance.
commands.syntax:
az apic import-from-apim --apim-apis
                         --apim-name
                         [--apim-resource-group]
                         [--apim-subscription]
                         [--ids]
                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                         [--resource-group]
                         [--service-name]
                         [--subscription]
examples: az apic import-from-apim -g api-center-test --service-name contoso-apic --apim-name contoso-apim --apim-apis *
az apic import-from-apim -g api-center-test --service-name contoso-apic --apim-name contoso-apim --apim-apis [echo,foo]
az apic import-from-apim -g api-center-test --service-name contoso-apic --apim-subscription 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 --apim-resource-group apim-rg --apim-name contoso-apim --apim-apis *

commands.name: az apic list
commands.summary: Lists Azure API Center services within an Azure subscription.

commands.name: az apic show
commands.summary: Show details of an Azure API Center service instance.

commands.name: az apic update
commands.summary: Update an instance of an Azure API Center service.
commands.syntax:
az apic update [--add]
               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
               [--identity]
               [--ids]
               [--name]
               [--remove]
               [--resource-group]
               [--set]
               [--subscription]
               [--tags]
